alert.note: Alert for Madison; Northern Oneida; Otsego; Southern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Oneida, northwestern Otsego and southeastern Madison Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 630 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles northeast of Taberg to near Earlville. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Utica, Rome, Oneida, Kirkland, Lee, Verona, Westmoreland, Trenton, Paris and Deerfield. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 between 31 and 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Madison; Northern Oneida; Otsego; Southern Oneida
